title: Trials
description: I told you to expect trouble.It has come in droves for me. Things have turned to the dark side. Things from my worst nightmares have come to haunt me.As my life starts to spiral out of my control, i find myself trapped, unable to return to my family. Can I continue when all seems lost?*A Paranormal Reverse Harem Series: M/F/M/M/M/M/M
author: Eve Newton
